name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its classic box, buttons, arms, legs, and screen, Volt combines both retro aesthetics and advanced technology. It is a charismatic and intelligent robot, capable of displaying various waveforms with precision. Its ability to analyze electronic signals and troubleshoot circuitry makes it a valuable asset in the WebtrES club's projects.
